publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-475# Bristow Muldoon: Car Parking Charges—That the Parliament notes with concern the decision by West Lothian Healthcare NHS Trust to introduce car park charging at St John’s Hospital in Livingston; recognises the financial burden this will put on users and the potential congestion problems this may cause to surrounding residential areas, and calls upon the Trust Board to suspend implementation until a full discussion with West Lothian Council has taken place. Supported by: Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Margaret Jamieson*
S1M-475# Car Parking Charges (lodged on 28 January 2000) Dr Elaine Murray*
S1M-475# Car Parking Charges (lodged on 28 January 2000) Hugh Henry*

S1M-475# Bristow Muldoon: Car Parking Charges—That the Parliament notes with concern the decision by West Lothian Healthcare NHS Trust to introduce car park charging at St John’s Hospital in Livingston; recognises the financial burden this will put on users and the potential congestion problems this may cause to surrounding residential areas, and calls upon the Trust Board to suspend implementation until a full discussion with West Lothian Council has taken place. Supported by: Mrs Mary Mulligan, Margaret Jamieson, Dr Elaine Murray, Hugh Henry, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-475# Car Parking Charges (lodged on 28 January 2000) Pauline McNeill*
S1M-475# Car Parking Charges (lodged on 28 January 2000) Cathy Jamieson*
S1M-475# Car Parking Charges (lodged on 28 January 2000) Mr John McAllion*

S1M-475# Bristow Muldoon: Car Parking Charges-That the Parliament notes with concern the decision by West Lothian Healthcare NHS Trust to introduce car park charging at St John's Hospital in Livingston; recognises the financial burden this will put on users and the potential congestion problems this may cause to surrounding residential areas, and calls upon the Trust Board to suspend implementation until a full consultation with the West Lothian public, and a full discussion with West Lothian Council has taken place. Supported by: Mrs Mary Mulligan, Margaret Jamieson, Dr Elaine Murray, Hugh Henry, Tommy Sheridan, Pauline McNeill, Cathy Jamieson, Mr John McAllion
S1M-475# Car Parking Charges (lodged on 28 January 2000) Donald Gorrie*, Fiona Hyslop*
